name: Wyrd Gun
description:
Breed the ultimate gun and struggle survive on a harsh planet!

Guns!

Have you ever wanted your shotgun and your bazooka to procreate? Do you fantacize about your sniper and your machine gun gettin down and durty? In Wyrdgun not only is this a reality... its a necessity.

Every gun has 16 mutatable stats and can gain 27 additional special stats through breeding that greatly change the gun!

Aliens!

Kill loads of freaks!

Heaps of em!

Planet!

Fight on an open world, procedurally generated, fully destructible, desert planet!

Mutations!

Gain wings, grappling webs, invisibility, and more.

Mutations are the progression system of Wyrdgun and persist across runs!

Perks!

Wyrdgun has a modular perk system. Each perk contains a trigger and an effect. For example: hp is low => slow time, on kill => create a nova, or on dig => + digspeed!

There are 28 triggers and 45 effects to choose from!
